name: flightstatistics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flightera_flight_data.
Tool description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera
API description: Returns statistics for a flight number with one entry per route flown. Statistics are updated daily.
The query can be filtered by route.
Statistics are always as of today, please contact us if you require historical statistics.

flnr.description: The flight number to request statistics for.

aptfrom.description: The IATA code of the departure airport. Defaults to None.

aptto.description: The IATA code of the arrival airport. Defaults to None.
